title: WCAS POLI_SCI 390-0-25 Special Topics in Political Science

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
"War and Peace" Prof. Daniel Krcmaric Winter 2017
This course covers the political science literature on the causes of war. We will primarily focus on interstate war, but the class also will include extensions to civil war, insurgency, terrorism, and humanitarian intervention.

subject: POLI_SCI
